title: Looking for my SECOND piece of The Monster
author: arott23

posts.post_title: Looking for my SECOND piece of The Monster
posts.post_content:
As some may know, I have decided it's time to acquire my SECOND T206. For my first piece, I'm looking for something kind of special. Just a few things I'm looking for:

Prefer it be a HOFer
Raw or Graded, doesn't matter
Have $130 right now, but will have more after Saturday
Looking for
SGC grading is also prefered
If I could pair a HOFer with a low end raw card, that would be awesome as well.
Not looking to overpay or anything like that.

I can do PayPal.
Please PM me or post here with offers.


Thanks!
Andrew

[quote name="arott23" post=1307305]As some may know, I have decided it's time to acquire my first T206. For my first piece, I'm looking for something kind of special. Just a few things I'm looking for:

Prefer it be a HOFer
Raw or Graded, doesn't matter
Have $80 right now, but will have more after Saturday
Nap Lajoie is a top priority
I know $80 doesn't get too far in the HOF T206 world so I'm not expecting a perfect card, but want only 4 corners (not five :))
If I could pair a HOFer with a low end raw card, that would be awesome as well.

I can do PayPal or Cash/money order.
Please PM me or post here with offers.

Willing to do deals with more money, if you don't mind getting paid Saturday night.

Thanks!
Andrew[/QUOTE]

Now Andrew....there is nothing wrong with having five corners. Five corners can be beautiful and charming. Five corners can be satisfyingly inexpensive...which is good for your health. Five corners can save your life!!!!

Actually I do have one Lajoie with just a lowly four corners...

Tom C
What condition are you looking for?

Whatever I can buy for around that price haha just really looking for at least a HOFer for my first purchase. Would also prefer four corners and not a lot of paper loss.

Thanks!

I have these 3 low grade HOFers at a low price:

Evers polar bear $50
Kelley (trimmed) $29
Bresnahan (tiny piece of the bottom right corner on the back is detached and wants to fall off -just the back though) $27

Free shipping

Let me know if you like any of them.  I have other HOF and commons too.  Good luck with your first purchase!
Let's try this again! Don't really want to go to ebay.
Down a few posts you can find three HOF cards Frank is offering that meet your criteria.

[quote name="Mountaineer1999" post=1315287]Down a few posts you can find three HOF cards Frank is offering that meet your criteria.[/QUOTE]

Andrew, I'll volunteer my opinion as somebody who is also collecting the T206 set. Of the three, I would choose the Evers, and I'll tell you why. It has the least corner wear. It has very nice centering, no indication of trimming, and no really noticeable creases in the middle. That makes for the nicest display of the card's subject. Plus, it has a Polar Bear back, which I would consider an exotic back for somebody that's just started collecting the Monster. There are 39 different backs, and Polar Bear is 30th on the back scarcity list I use. That would make for a pretty nice pickup for your second card. But, of course, choose which one you like most, or pick from somewhere else if you don't like any of those. 

Good luck, and please let us know what you choose. 

Bill

I have a Joe Kelley SGC 10. Really nice front for the grade with some paper loss on back.

I have a PSA 1.5 Home Run Baker for $80 delivered or I can throw in a PSA 2 Tim Jordan Portrait for $100 delivered.
